nodes.text: The Halls of the Nydak were a set of halls and small natural rooms on the planet Dathomir. It was home to mainly nydaks, but bane back spiders also roamed the location. Walls in the halls were decorated by Dathomirian Glyphs. By 14 BBY, the former Jedi General Taron Malicos killed Nightbrother leader Viscus.
